PathOfBuilding.Notes: Build Updates: NOTE: Cyclone's DPS numbers do not include Impale in any capacity and thus are significantly lower than we are actually achieving. NOTE: To sustain mana we use a rare jewel with the modifier ".2-.4% of physical damage leeched as mana." Cheap and effective.
